alert.note: Alert for Mills; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:16PM CDT until May 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mills County in southwestern Iowa... South central Pottawattamie County in southwestern Iowa... Northeastern Cass County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 816 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plattsmouth, or 8 miles south of Offutt AFB, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pacific Junction around 825 PM CDT. Glenwood around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Silver City and Treynor. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 29 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
